name: CreateTrainingDataConfig
description:
Create a new training data configuration.

Call this tool to set up a new training data configuration for your application. It is used when you need to initialize or update your training data setup.

parameters.name: training_data_name
parameters.description: The name of the training data container to be created.

value_schema.description: The name of the training data container.

parameters.name: training_data_visibility
parameters.description: Specifies who can access the training data. Valid options: "everyone", "user_only", "ai_agent_only". Defaults to "everyone".

value_schema.description:
The visibility of the training data. Defaults to "everyone".

Valid values: "everyone", "user_only", "ai_agent_only"
